hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: project
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.description: 工程名，请参照如下格式（备注：分隔符支持换行）： project1 project2 ...

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
sudo su - root <<FEOF echo "nameserver 114.114.114.114" >> /etc/resolv.conf
#yum install python3-pip -y --repo OS #pip3 install pexpect -i https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple
FEOF
( cat <<EOF [general] apiurl=http://117.78.1.88 no_verify=yes [http://117.78.1.88] user=${OBS_USER} pass=${OBS_PWD} EOF ) > ~/.oscrc
#set +e #git config --global user.email "80474298@qq.com" #git config --global user.name "openeuler-ci-bot" #git config --global pull.ff only #rm -rf openeuler_obs-*
if [ "${OBS_BACKEND_SERVER_IP}" == "172.16.1.95" ];then OBS_BACKEND_USR=${OBS_BACKEND_USR_main} OBS_BACKEND_PWD=${OBS_BACKEND_PWD_main} echo "95" elif [ "${OBS_BACKEND_SERVER_IP}" == "172.16.1.124" ];then OBS_BACKEND_USR=${OBS_BACKEND_USR_other} OBS_BACKEND_PWD=${OBS_BACKEND_PWD_other} echo "124" elif [ "${OBS_BACKEND_SERVER_IP}" == "172.16.1.155" ];then OBS_BACKEND_USR=${OBS_BACKEND_USR_002} OBS_BACKEND_PWD=${OBS_BACKEND_PWD_002} echo "155" elif [ "${OBS_BACKEND_SERVER_IP}" == "172.16.1.32" ];then OBS_BACKEND_USR=${OBS_BACKEND_USR_003} OBS_BACKEND_PWD=${OBS_BACKEND_PWD_003} echo "32" elif [ "${OBS_BACKEND_SERVER_IP}" == "172.16.1.234" ];then OBS_BACKEND_USR=${OBS_BACKEND_USR_004} OBS_BACKEND_PWD=${OBS_BACKEND_PWD_004} echo "234" fi
# http://117.78.1.88:82/obs_build_log/ # https://gitee.com/openeuler/pkgship # https://pkgmanage.openeuler.org/Packagemanagement
osc r openEuler:Mainline --xml > openeuler_mainline_result_20220712.xml osc r openEuler:Epol --xml > openeuler_epol_result_20220712.xml
rm -rf home:zhouxiaxiang osc co home:zhouxiaxiang project_build_result cp ./home\:zhouxiaxiang/project_build_result/build_result.py .
python3 build_result.py -c "build_result_20220712.csv" -l "117.78.1.88:82" -p ${project}
cp openeuler_mainline_result_20220712.xml ./home\:zhouxiaxiang/project_build_result cp openeuler_epol_result_20220712.xml ./home\:zhouxiaxiang/project_build_result cp build_result_20220712.csv ./home\:zhouxiaxiang/project_build_result cd ./home\:zhouxiaxiang/project_build_result osc addremove osc ci -n
echo "finish"
#cp ./home\:zhouxiaxiang/testing2/ssh_cmd.py .
#set -e #echo ${cmd} #python3 ssh_cmd.py -ip ${OBS_BACKEND_SERVER_IP} -bu ${OBS_BACKEND_USR} -bp ${OBS_BACKEND_PWD} -c "${cmd}"
